response:
MRI is the gold standard to demonstrate dissemination in space and time (plaques). CSF analysis is required to detect oligoclonal bands supportive of MS. Serological testing is critical to differentiate MS from NMO/MOGAD and other inflammatory or infectious mimics.

investigations = ["MRI of brain and whole spine with contrast", "Visual Evoked Potentials", "Lumbar Puncture for CSF analysis (Oligoclonal bands, protein, glucose, cell count)", "Serum AQP4 antibodies", "Serum MOG antibodies", "Full blood count", "Urea and electrolytes", "Liver function tests", "C-reactive protein", "Erythrocyte sedimentation rate", "Vitamin B12", "Folate", "Thyroid function tests", "HIV serology", "Syphilis serology", "Autoimmune screen (ANA, ENA, dsDNA)"]
